verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>; And all that is within <WH7130> me <WH6944>, bless his holy name <WH8034>.
Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>, And forget <WH7911> not all his benefits <WH1576>:
Who forgiveth <WH5545> all thine iniquities <WH5771>; Who healeth <WH7495> all thy diseases <WH8463>;
Who redeemeth <WH1350> thy life <WH2416> from destruction <WH7845>; Who crowneth <WH5849> thee with lovingkindness <WH2617> and tender mercies <WH7356>;
Who satisfieth <WH7646> thy desire <WH5716> with good <WH2896> things <WH5271>, So that thy youth is renewed like the eagle <WH2318>.
Jehovah <WH3068> executeth <WH6213> righteous <WH6666> acts <WH4941>, And judgments for all that are oppressed <WH6231>.
He made known <WH3045> his ways <WH1870> unto Moses <WH4872>, His doings <WH5949> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is merciful <WH7349> and gracious <WH2587>, Slow <WH750> to anger <WH639>, and abundant <WH7227> in lovingkindness <WH2617>.
He will not always <WH5331> chide <WH7378>; Neither will he keep <WH5201> his anger for ever <WH5769>.
He hath not dealt <WH6213> with us after our sins <WH2399>, Nor rewarded <WH1580> us after our iniquities <WH5771>.
For as the heavens <WH8064> are high above <WH1361> the earth <WH776>, So great <WH1396> is his lovingkindness <WH2617> toward them that fear him <WH3373>.
As far as <WH7368> the east <WH4217> is from the west <WH4628>, So far hath he removed <WH7368> our transgressions from us <WH6588>.
Like as a father <WH1> pitieth <WH7355> his children <WH1121>, So Jehovah <WH3068> pitieth <WH7355> them that fear him <WH3373>.
For he knoweth <WH3045> our frame <WH3336>; He remembereth <WH2142> that we are dust <WH6083>.
As for man <WH582>, his days <WH3117> are as grass <WH2682>; As a flower <WH6731> of the field <WH7704>, so he flourisheth <WH6692>.
For the wind <WH7307> passeth over <WH5674> it <WH4725>, and it is gone; And the place thereof shall know it no more <WH5234>.

But the lovingkindness <WH2617> of Jehovah <WH3068> is from everlasting <WH5769> to <WH5704> everlasting <WH5769> upon them that fear <WH3373> him <WH6666>, And his righteousness unto children <WH1121>'s children <WH1121>;
To such as keep <WH8104> his covenant <WH1285>, And to those that remember <WH2142> his precepts <WH6490> to do them <WH6213>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath established <WH3559> his throne <WH3678> in the heavens <WH8064>; And his kingdom <WH4438> ruleth over all <WH4910>.

Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, ye his angels <WH4397>, That are mighty <WH1368> in strength <WH3581>, that fulfil <WH6213> his word <WH1697>, Hearkening <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of his word <WH1697>.
Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, all ye his hosts <WH6635>, Ye ministers <WH8334> of his <WH6213>, that do his pleasure <WH7522>.
Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, all ye his works <WH4639>, In all places <WH4725> of his dominion <WH4475>: Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>.
